title: Jacket
description: black with red and green embroidery on band around neck opening and around sleeves; lower sleeves sewn in black corduroy and narrow bands of red and white cotton; large rectangle fully embroidered on back in red, white and yellow with corduroy edging; tail and sleeves lined in black and tan; green silk band at top of each sleeve, above narrow black silk band
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
